full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Digital PCR System

## Reference and Solicitation Information

Tender reference: WS3605946636-Doc3609405936
Solicitation number: WS3605946636
Amendment number: 6

## Publication and Closing Dates

Announcement date: October 21, 2022
Tender closing date: December 13, 2022 2:00 PM EST
Amendment date: December 2, 2022

## Contract Details

Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
End-user entity: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
Contract start date: None
Contract end date: July 1, 2023

## Scope

A request for proposal is being issued for the acquisition, delivery, and installation of a digital PCR system for the St-Jean-sur-Richelieu Research and Development Centre in St-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada.

## Procurement Details

Procurement category: Goods
Procurement method: Competitive, open bidding
Selection criteria: Lowest price
Trade agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

## Important Notes

* The tender closing date has been extended to December 13, 2022 2:00 PM EST.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by the specified closing date and time.
* Bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will be declared non-responsive.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact Alina Cocieru, SPAC/PSPC, at alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

## Notice URL

The tender notice can be accessed at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14331802?extsite=MTQzMzE4MDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
